function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid dispersal of COVID-19 from Wuhan due to travel","Impact":"Increased spread of the disease to other cities","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel bans and restrictions on movement","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking, travel documentation checks","People":"Population of other cities, travelers from Wuhan","Owner":"Government authorities, travel agencies"},{"Description":"Strong correlation between number of cases and travelers from Wuhan","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission in cities with more travelers from Wuhan","Mitigation":"Enforce strict quarantine measures for travelers from Wuhan, increase testing capacity in high-traffic cities","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, quarantine facilities","People":"Local health authorities, travelers from Wuhan","Owner":"Health departments, quarantine facilities"},{"Description":"Delayed arrival of COVID-19 in other cities due to travel ban","Impact":"Reduction in the rapid spread of the disease to other cities","Mitigation":"Continue to enforce travel bans and restrictions, enhance screening measures at entry points","Technologies":"Thermal scanners, contactless temperature monitoring","People":"Population of other cities, travelers from Wuhan","Owner":"Government authorities, border control agencies"}]}
